• If there is no progress of labour within one to two hours after membrane rupture, augment with oxytocin if not
contraindicated.
• Give analgesia using morphine (0.1mg/kg to a maximum dose of 10mg) IM four hourly if necessary.
• Caesarean delivery is indicated if:
o there is lack of progress despite oxytocin augmentation, life-threatening haemorrhage, ongoing DIC,
or severe oliguria
